meanings.definition: A complete change of form or appearance into a more beautiful or spiritual state.
meanings.sent1: The transfigurations of the caterpillar into a butterfly are truly miraculous.
meanings.sent2: The artist's transfigurations of ordinary objects into works of art captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: Witnessing the transfigurations of the old house into a modern masterpiece was like watching a magic show.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a transfiguration that lit up the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The transfigurations of the landscape after the snowfall were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The act of transforming or changing into something more elevated or exalted.
meanings.sent1: The transfigurations of the humble farmer into a wise leader inspired the community.
meanings.sent2: Through hard work and dedication, she achieved transfigurations in her career beyond her wildest dreams.
meanings.sent3: The sudden transfigurations of the shy student into a confident speaker surprised everyone in the class.
meanings.sent4: His music was a transfiguration that touched the hearts of all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The transfigurations of the ordinary garden into a paradise were a result of her green thumb.
